items.title: Trump credits Benioff, Huang for decision not to ‘surge’ Fed troops into San Francisco
items.summary: Trump said he scrapped plans to send the National Guard into San Francisco after calls from Nvidia’s Jensen Huang and Salesforce’s Marc Benioff. Mayor Daniel Lurie confirmed the plan was canceled.

items.title: Get a premium clean with the latest and upgraded roborock Qrevo CurvX robot vac + mop at $950 (Reg. up to $1,500)
items.summary:
Right alongside the second-ever low price we spotted on its M7 Q5+ robot, the official roborock Amazon storefront is also now offering the Qrevo CurvX Robot Vacuum and Mop at $949.99 shipped. While normally carrying a $1,500 MSRP directly from the brand, we’ve been seeing this newer generation of the Curv robot keeping between $1,000 and $1,100 since late September, with the Prime Day event two weeks ago giving us a one-time drop to the $900 low. If you missed that price, today’s deal comes in as the next-best rate we have tracked, cutting $150 off the going rate and a total $550 off the MSRP.

items.title: US repatriates drug submarine survivors in line with wartime protocols, says Hegseth
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth defended the U.S. decision to repatriate two survivors of a recent military strike on a suspected drug-smuggling submarine, likening it to battlefield practices during the Iraq and Afghanistan wars. Read full story

items.title: Intel reports Q3 revenue up 3% YoY to $13.7B, vs. $13.2B est., and net income of $4.1B, vs. a net loss of $16.6B in Q3 2024; INTC jumps 5%+ after hours (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
items.summary:
Kif Leswing / CNBC:
Intel reports Q3 revenue up 3% YoY to $13.7B, vs. $13.2B est., and net income of $4.1B, vs. a net loss of $16.6B in Q3 2024; INTC jumps 5%+ after hours  —  Intel reported better-than-expected revenue on Thursday, signaling that demand for its core x86 processors for PCs has recovered.
